data.actual_result: Tooltip will be shown somewhere else (at the middle of the message).
data.expected_result: Channel category tooltip should be shown above the channel linking.
data.short_description: Wrong position for category tooltip for a channel link with line break
data.steps_to_repro: - Send/have a message with a channel linking - Make sure this channel linking is cut off and will be shown in 2 lines - Make sure this channel is in a channel category - Hover this channel link - Observe the position of the channel category tooltip
